bits 2 Bedside

The UX Prescription

Whether a patient or provider, the chorus of dismal usability with our medical records systems is all too common. Development of electronic medical record (EMR) systems desperately need a user experience overhaul.

08 October 2016

Floppy Disk UI

Floppy Disk icons — how much longer until we consider this UI dinosaur no longer applicable? One could argue the shift should have taken place at least a decade ago as I honestly can’t recall using a floppy disk after year 2000.
